body:
üëç 
Maybe consider  `move HeartbeatDetect and Handler to  **cluster package of** control-panel` ?

My project dependencies list contains spring-boot-starter-actuator:2.3.0. It will check application health status. also it will check db connections use SQL such as "select 1". During that moment, the exception was thrown.
Maybe this is the problem.
how to reproduce your case?
i will fix it.
ShardingSphere-Proxy

@yu199195 Hi,this is complete sharding configuration.
```
spring:
  shardingsphere:
    props:
      sql.show: true
      query.with.cipher.column: true
    datasource:
      names: ds
      ds:
        type: com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource
        driver-class-name: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
        jdbc-url: jdbc:mysql://${MYSQL_HOST:localhost}:${MYSQL_PORT:3306}/${MYSQL_DB:bs}?serverTimezone=Asia/Shanghai
        username: ${MYSQL_USER:bs}
        password: ${MYSQL_PASSWORD:bs12345}
        hikari:
          minimum-idle: 60
          maximum-pool-size: 60
          idle-timeout: 60000
          max-lifetime: 1800000
          connection-timeout: 3000
          pool-name: BabyshowHikariCP
          connection-test-query: SELECT 1
    sharding:
      default-data-source-name: ds
      tables:
        care_diary:
          key-generator:
            column: care_diary_id
            type: snowflake
        system_user:
          key-generator:
            column: system_user_id
            type: snowflake
      encrypt-rule:
        tables:
          system_user:
            columns:
              credential:
                encryptor: bs_encrypt
                cipherColumn: credential
        encryptors:
          bs_encrypt:
            type: aes
            props:
              aes.key.value: ${SHARDING_ENCRYPTOR_AES_PWD:2020$bs#0105}
```

    mt_tables:

        actualDataNodes: ds_${0..1}.t_order_${0..1}
        tableStrategy:
          standard:
            shardingColumn: order_id
            shardingAlgorithm:
              type: INLINE
              props:
                algorithm.expression: t_order_${order_id % 2}
        dataBaseStrategy:
          standard:
            shardingColumn: user_id
            shardingAlgorithm:
              type: INLINE
              props:
                algorithm.expression: t_order_${user_id % 2}
        keyGenerator:
          type: SNOWFLAKE
          column: order_id
    at_table:
      t_new: # New one

          standard:
            shardingColumn: order_id
            shardingAlgorithm:
              type: MOD
              props:
                mod.value: 5
        keyGenerator:
          type: SNOWFLAKE
          column: order_id
